price: 91. Apusani ngambu ya banzambe na bango alobi: Boliaka te?
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
